t: When*pn the Lord*s restored the fortunes of Zion, we*ln were like those who dream.
Our*ln mouths were filled with laughter then, and*ln our tongues with shouts of joy. Then*ln they said among the nations, “The*ln Lord*s has done great things for them.”
The*ln Lord*s had done great things for us; we*ln were joyful.
Restore*pn our fortunes, Lord,*s like*ln watercourses in the Negev.
Those*ln who sow in tears will*ln reap with shouts of joy.
Though*ln one goes along weeping, carrying*ln the bag of seed, he*ln will surely come back with shouts of joy, carrying*ln his sheaves.
